Caption: Students perform Bhangda dance
Description: From left: Mr. A. Rehman (confirmation required), Mr. Jagmohan Anand, Mr. Pritam Lal Kapur, Mr. R. Paul and Mr. Esmail A. Olia standing on the shoulder. (Identification by Mr. Anand Singh Bawa, Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. Esmail A. Olia and Mr. Jagmohan Anand). Bhangda is a traditional dance associated with the spring harvest festival. It originated in Sialkot in the Majha area of Punjab.
